location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 25: Rawson Hart Boddam, John Torlesse, Robert Sparks, Charles Bourchier, James Morley and Alexander Callander, Council at Bombay Castle, to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter, received 5 April 1784, discusses the woollen trade and the movements of the ships, the Europaand the Panther. It also includes a letter (no. 26, dated 6 February 1784) from Rawson Hart Boddam and colleagues in Bombay to Captain William Applegarth, Commander of the Europa.
